summary: Full-stack engineer passionate about building user-centric applications with modern technologies and best practices. Experienced in leading cross-functional teams and delivering scalable solutions.

Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 80%
Achieved 99.9% uptime across all production services
